turns.content: write a song about it in the style of blackpink then

Verse 1:
In the depths of the sea,
There's a beauty we've never seen,
A creature with fins and scales,
A mermaid that sails.

Chorus:
Mermaid, mermaid,
Siren of the sea,
In your world of wonder,
We long to be.

Verse 2:
In a world of magic,
There's a creature we admire,
A horse with a horn,
A unicorn that soars.

Chorus:
Unicorn, unicorn,
Mythical and pure,
In your world of wonder,
Our hearts allure.

Bridge:
We'll dive into the ocean,
And ride on unicorns,
To a world of fantasy,
Where love is reborn.

Chorus:
Mermaid, mermaid,
Unicorn of our dreams,
In your world of wonder,
We'll make it our theme.

Outro:
Mermaids and unicorns,
A fantasy we adore,
In our hearts forevermore,
We'll believe in them even more.
